channel.title: Useful Radix related links (community tools and more)
channel.description:
# Useful links
### Official links
* [Website](https://www.radixdlt.com/) * [Radix blog](https://www.radixdlt.com/blog) * [Wallet download](https://wallet.radixdlt.com/) * [Explorer](https://explorer.radixdlt.com/#/) * [Instapass (KYC)](https://www.instapass.io/) * [Instabridge (eXRD -> XRD)](https://www.instabridge.io/)
### Telegram groups
* [Radix DLT Official](https://t.me/radix_dlt) * [Radix Trader (for price talk)](https://t.me/Radix_TRADER) * [Unofficial community managed groups](https://radixtalk.com/t/unofficial-community-managed-groups/81)
### eXRD stats * [Coinmarketcap](https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/radix/) * [CoinGecko](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/e-radix)
### Community tools * **[Florian Pieper Staking](https://florianpieperstaking.com/)** * Staking rewards calculator * [Validator list](https://florianpieperstaking.com/validators) * **[Radix Portfolio](https://www.radixportfolio.info/)** * Staking dashboard and more great tools for staking * **[RadixScan](https://www.radixscan.io/)** * [Validator list](https://www.radixscan.io/ValidatorTable.shtml) * [Network explorer](https://www.radixscan.io/JSONExplorer.shtml) * [Network utilization](https://www.radixscan.io/NetworkUtilization.shtml) * [Radix Tokens list](https://www.radixscan.io/TokenTable.shtml) * **[Radix Dashboard](https://www.radixdashboard.com/)** * Staking APY % * Epoch information * Network & XRD metrics * Validator list * **[CaviarNine Stats](https://caviarnine.com/stats)** * Amount of XRD staked * Total number of XRD wallets * Amount of XRD fee burned * Number of actions (transfers, staking, etc..) * **[Radix Earth](https://www.radix.earth/)** * Validator list with node geolocation (useful to promote geographical decentralization)
